background_description: Dark, deep blue open water with some blurry shapes of other fish in the distant background, suggesting an aquarium or deep water environment.
explanation: The image clearly shows a vibrantly blue Mbuna Cichlid in the foreground and a bright yellow Electric Yellow Cichlid further back. Both fish exhibit distinct, striking colors that contrast sharply with the dark water background, making them highly visible and indicating no camouflage.
